channel.title: 614 Questions
channel.description:
Just a quick question, there is a guide here:
http://www.runelocys/forums/showthread.php?12422-613-614-server-client-webclient-fix-working&highlight=source
NOTE: Remember to change the Y to a U in the link.
And i can't post on Runelocys, so i'm asking you guys.
As a piece of the post says:
What changes do I have to make in the server source in order to login?
The server also needs to access the cache in order to run and the path to the cache is located in:
613-Server-Folder/src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/uti/CacheConstants.java
Open CacheConstants.java file and replace the path to cache.
I don't understand what i need to change in the CacheConstants.java?
Also, i do that all, and i get the client running, and it stops at "Loading Screen Title - 0%" why why why?

item.title: 614 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Preist Preist
item.description:
@Preist wrote:

Just a quick question, there is a guide here:

http://www.runelocys/forums/showthread.php?12422-613-614-server-client-webclient-fix-working&highlight=source

NOTE: Remember to change the Y to a U in the link.

And i can’t post on Runelocys, so i’m asking you guys.

As a piece of the post says:

What changes do I have to make in the server source in order to login?

The server also needs to access the cache in order to run and the path to the cache is located in:

613-Server-Folder/src/dragonkk/rs2rsps/uti/CacheConstants.java

Open CacheConstants.java file and replace the path to cache.

I don’t understand what i need to change in the CacheConstants.java?

Also, i do that all, and i get the client running, and it stops at “Loading Screen Title - 0%” why why why?

Read full topic
